answers.author: Brian Yeich
answers.text:
We have several "Event Coordinators" and "Event Managers."  Is this something you are looking for?  If so, go to: https://ww4.sanantonio.gov/hrjobdescr/jobs/search.aspx, and type "event" in the search box.  This will give you description and salary.

author: Tracy Domingues
text: I am seeking information regarding an Event Recruiter position.  Instead of a position of event production, I am researching a position of event recruitment (and coordination of private event producers solicited/recruited to produce their event in our city) in an effort to increase the number of event days at our venues.  Do you have a job description, contract, pay package/scale, evaluation tool or any other information that would be helpful?
title: Event Recruiter Information Sought
